title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Building workflows of your choosing: agents, copilots, and everything in between
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-构建您选择的工作流：代理、副驾驶及其间的一切
abstract: Agents in Tines are powerful enablers you build in the context of your workflows. We believe that agentic workflows are part of the future, but not the whole picture. Come by this session to see how to blend agentic, deterministic, and human-in-the-loop workflows for your infrastructure management and AI governance needs. Reduce the friction involved in managing AI at scale with AWS for your infrastructure and Tines for your AI orchestration. This presentation is brought to you by Tines, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Tines 中的 Agent 是您在工作流程中构建的强大推动器。我们相信 agentic 工作流程是未来的一部分，但并非全部。欢迎参加本次会议，了解如何将 agentic、确定性和人机协同工作流程相结合，以满足您的基础设施管理和 AI 治理需求。通过 AWS 管理基础设施和 Tines 进行 AI 编排，减少大规模管理 AI 所涉及的摩擦。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Tines 为您呈现。
